latest.title: Allotment of Shares
latest.content:
9 Dec 2025 16:32
RNS Number : 8918K
Golden Rock Global PLC
09 December 2025
9 December 2025
Golden Rock Global Plc
(the "
Company
")
Allotment of Shares
The Company announces it has today allotted 3,800,000 ordinary shares of £0.01 each in the capital of the Company
(the "
Shares
")
following the exercise of the warrants constituted by the Broker Warrant Instrument executed by the Company on 20 July 2023, at an exercise price of 2.5p per Share and the Company has confirmed receipt of £95,000 into its bank account in settlement.
Applications for admission of the Shares
to the Equity Shares (Shell Companies) Category of the Official List of the Financial Conduct Authority and to trading on the main market for listed securities of the London Stock Exchange will be made and it is expected that admission of the Shares will become effective on or around 18 December 2025 and that dealings in the Shares will commence at that time.
As at the date of this announcement, the Company's issued ordinary share capital comprises 31,325,000 ordinary shares of £0.01 each. The above figure may be used by shareholders as the denominator for the calculations by which they will determine if they are required to notify their interest in, or a change to their interest in, the share capital of the Company under the FCA's Disclosure and Transparency Rules.
Enquiries
Golden Rock Global plc
John Croft
Email:John@croftinternationalpartners.com
Tel: 0778 531 5588
The information contained within this announcement is deemed to constitute inside information as stipulated under the retained EU law version of the Market Abuse Regulation (EU) No. 596/2014 (the "
UK MAR
") which is part of UK law by virtue of the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018. The information is disclosed in accordance with the Company's obligations under Article 17 of the UK MAR. latest.title: CONVERTIBLE NOTE TO RAISE UP TO £1.1 MILLION
latest.content:
12 Nov 2025 08:27
RNS Number : 2305H
Golden Rock Global PLC
12 November 2025
12th November 2025
Golden Rock Global plc
(the "
Company
")
CONVERTIBLE NOTE OFFERING TO RAISE UP TO £1.1 MILLION
LONDON, November 12th. (RNS) Golden Rock Global plc, ("
GCG
" or the "
Company
") a Jersey registered Special Purpose Acquisition Company admitted to the Equity Shares (Shell Companies) category of the Official List of the Financial Conduct Authority and to the main market of the London Stock Exchange plc is undertaking a fundraising of up to £1,100,000 in aggregate principal by the issue of convertible loan notes due 2028 (the "
Convertible Notes
") with a conversion price of £0.03 per ordinary share in the Company (the "
Ordinary Shares
").
The Convertible Notes shall bear interest from (and including) the date of their issue at the rate of 8% per annum, calculated by reference to the principal outstanding of the Convertible Notes until their maturity or date of repayment if earlier.
Noteholders will also receive one warrant for every two Ordinary Shares issued as a result of the conversion of the Convertible Notes (the "
CLN Warrants
"). Each CLN Warrant provides the holder with the right to subscribe for one Ordinary Share at a price of £0.03, exercisable for three years after issuance.
To date the Company has entered into agreements raising an aggregate of £855,000 of which funds have been received for £430,000.
GCG anticipates the closing of the CLN will take place on or around November 21st, once the balance of the funds has been received the Company and will update the market accordingly.
Enquiries
Golden Rock Global plc
John Croft
Email:John@croftinternationalpartners.com
Tel: 0778 531 5588
The information contained within this announcement is deemed to constitute inside information as stipulated under the retained EU law version of the Market Abuse Regulation (EU) No. 596/2014 (the "
UK MAR
") which is part of UK law by virtue of the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018. The information is disclosed in accordance with the Company's obligations under Article 17 of the UK MAR. Upon the publication of this announcement, this inside information is now considered to be in the public domain.
This information is provided by RNS, the news service of the London Stock Exchange. RNS is approved by the Financial Conduct Authority to act as a Primary Information Provider in the United Kingdom. TR-1: Notification of Major Holdings
LONDON, October 27, 2025. (RNS) Golden Rock Global, ("
LSE: GCG
" or the "
Company
") has today
received notification that Feng Chen crossed a threshold regarding major holdings. The notification, pertaining to an acquisition or disposal of voting rights, indicates that Feng Chen's total voting rights attached to shares in GCG is 0% as of September 25, 2025. This is based on a total number of 0 voting rights attached to shares with ISIN code JE00BYZT0R68.
